title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – Cam's low ball first class offer; Amari contract leverage; Tyreek Hill suspension odds; NFC East O/U's; Middlekauff Mailbag
itunes:title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – Cam's low ball first class offer; Amari contract leverage; Tyreek Hill suspension odds; NFC East O/U's; Middlekauff Mailbag
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2.  In this episode, Middlekauff gives his take on the viral video of Cam Newton getting shut down after offering $1,500 to buy a first class seat on a flight from Paris, Amari Cooper's contract expectations, if Tyreek Hill will be suspended despite having child abuse charges dropped, his NFC East Over/Under picks, and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to www.theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
